statements: DELETE FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE total_population > 10000000 AND coverage_rate < 0.8;
DELETE FROM Vaccination_Coverage WHERE country_id = 1 AND last_update < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Immunization_Gaps WHERE gap_id = 10 AND gap_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM CoverageGaps WHERE gap_description LIKE '%missing%' AND country_name = 'USA';
DELETE FROM VaccineInventory WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM VaccineRecords WHERE vaccination_date < '2021-10-01' AND vaccine_name = 'Pfizer';
DELETE FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE center_id = 1 AND coverage_percent > 80
DELETE FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccine_id = 2 AND patient_id = 5
